 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַף‎</span> **conjunction** ==also== (Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַף‎</span>; Egyptian Aramaic, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אף‎</span> ([[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap.</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>224</sup>); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַף‎</span>, <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> also <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אוֺף‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — ***also***, alwlays <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וְאַף‎</span> [[Dan.6.23|Dan 6:23]]; [[Ezra.5.10|Ezra 5:10]]; [[Ezra.5.14|Ezra 5:14]]; [[Ezra.6.5|Ezra 6:5]].
